recorder.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 '''Allows to listen and recognize speech'''
3 
4 import pyaudio
5 import time
6 import audioop
7 
8 import logging
9 
10 logging.basicConfig(filename='recorder.log', format='[%(asctime)s] %(message)s\n\n',
11  level=logging.ERROR)
12 
13 class Recorder:
14 
15 
16  def __init__(self, pyaudio_config: dict, min_rms=100):
17  try:
18  self.set_min_rms(min_rms=min_rms)
19  #set up pyaudio configuration and start audio stream
20  self.format = pyaudio_config['format']
21  self.channels = pyaudio_config['channels']
22  self.rate = pyaudio_config['rate']
23  self.chunk_size = pyaudio_config['frames_per_buffer']
24 
25  self.audio = pyaudio.PyAudio()
26  self.stream = self.audio.open(format=self.format, channels=self.channels, rate=self.rate, input=True, frames_per_buffer=self.chunk_size)
27  self.stream.start_stream()
28  except Exception as e:
29  logging.error(str(e))
30 
31  def set_min_rms(self, min_rms):
32  self.min_rms = min_rms
33 
34  def record(self, last_chunk):
35  print('rec')
36  '''Records speech until silence
37  Args:
38  last_chunk: last chunk before record starting
39  stream: audio stream
40  min_rms: minimal rms value that is not silence
41  Returns:
42  buf: contains recorded audio data, bytes type
43  '''
44  try:
45  buf = last_chunk
46  silence_start = time.time()
47  while (time.time() - silence_start) < 1.2:
48  chunk = self.stream.read(self.chunk_size)
49  if audioop.rms(chunk, 2) >= self.min_rms / 3 :
50  buf += chunk
51  if audioop.rms(chunk, 2) >= self.min_rms:
52  silence_start = time.time()
53  return buf
54  except Exception as e:
55  logging.error(str(e))
56  return None
57 
58  def listen(self):
59 
60  while True:
61  chunk = self.stream.read(self.chunk_size)
62  #if sound detected record raw data until silence
63  if audioop.rms(chunk, 2) >= self.min_rms:
64  buf = self.record(last_chunk=chunk)
65  return buf
